title: Online Progressive Peer Assessment-Based Project-Based Learning (PBL) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Focused on project execution for solving social issues and peer feedback exchange, ensuring accessibility via smartphone-based online assessment tools.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute a project on real local community issues within six months using the PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach
Learners can provide structured feedback at three stages (planning/interim/final) for peers' project outcomes using peer assessment tools
Learners can iteratively improve their project outcomes three or more times by reflecting on peer assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
